list.name: Test Start
list.query: SELECT first(*) FROM testStartEnd WHERE status='started' AND "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter

list.name: Test End
list.query: SELECT last(*) as "test_start" FROM testStartEnd WHERE status='finished' AND "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter

list.name: Saturation point
list.query: select responseBytes from requestsRaw where $timeFilter limit 3

dashboard.description: This dashboard shows live load test metrics provided by jMeter.

targets.query: SELECT count("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("errorCount") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("throughput") FROM (SELECT count(responseTime) AS "throughput" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s))

SELECT max("throughput") FROM (SELECT count(responseTime) AS "throughput" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s))
SELECT min("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("responseTime",95) FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "errorCount" = 0 AND "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND "requestName" =~ /^$request$/  AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation), "requestName" fill(null)

SELECT mean("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "errorCount" = 1 AND "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND "requestName" =~ /^$request$/  AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation), "requestName" fill(null)

SELECT max(sum) from (SELECT sum("maxActiveThreads")/10 FROM "virtualUsers" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)) GROUP BY time($aggregation)

SELECT sum("maxActiveThreads")/10 FROM "virtualUsers" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)

SELECT max("maxCount") FROM (SELECT count(responseTime) AS "maxCount" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "status" = 'OK' AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s))GROUP BY time($aggregation)

SELECT mean("meanCount") FROM (SELECT count(responseTime) AS "meanCount" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "status" = 'OK'  AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/  AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s))GROUP BY time($aggregation)

SELECT max("maxCount") FROM (SELECT count(responseTime) AS "maxCount" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "status" = 'KO' AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/  AND loadGenerator =~ /^$lg$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1s))GROUP BY time($aggregation)

SELECT COUNT("responseTime") as "CountA" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND "status" = 'OK' AND "responseTime"<=$low_limit AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT COUNT("responseTime") as "CountA" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND "status" = 'OK' AND "responseTime">$low_limit AND "responseTime"<$high_limit  AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT COUNT("responseTime") as "CountA" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND "status" = 'OK' AND "responseTime">$high_limit AND $timeFilter fill(null)

SELECT COUNT("responseTime") as "CountA" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND "status" = 'KO' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("responseBytes") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation)
SELECT mean("requestBytes") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation)

SELECT count(responseTime) as Count, mean(responseTime)/1000 as Average, median(responseTime)/1000 as Median, percentile(responseTime, 90)/1000 as "90% Line",percentile(responseTime, 95)/1000 as "95% Line",percentile(responseTime, 99)/1000 as "99% Line", min(responseTime)/1000 as Min, max(responseTime)/1000 as Max, (sum(errorCount)/count(responseTime))*100 as "Error Rate", stddev("responseTime") as "Standard Deviation",last(tpsRate) as "Throughput",last(networkRate) as "Network Throughput" FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "requestName"

SELECT mean("connectTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation), "requestName" fill(null)

SELECT count("responseTime") FROM "requestsRaw" WHERE projectName =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/  AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/  AND "responseCode" =~ /^$responseCode$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($aggregation), "responseCode" fill(null)

panels.title: Response Codes Over Time with $aggregation granulation

targets.query: SELECT count("errorMessage") AS "Failed asertion(s)",  last("errorMessage") AS "Last Message" FROM  "errorMessage" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "requestName"
SELECT errorMessage AS "All Messages" FROM "errorMessage" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "requestName"

list.label: Project ID
list.name: projectID
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /.*/ WITH KEY = "projectName"

list.label: Environment Type
list.name: envType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /.*/ WITH KEY = "envType"  WHERE  "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/

list.label: Test Type
list.name: testName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /.*/ WITH KEY = "testType"  WHERE  "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/

list.label: Requests
list.name: request
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /.*/ WITH KEY = "requestName" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "requestsRaw" WITH KEY = "responseCode" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/
list.label: responseCode
list.name: responseCode
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "requestsRaw" WITH KEY = "responseCode" WHERE "projectName" =~ /^$projectID$/ AND "envType" =~ /^$envType$/ AND "testType" =~ /^$testName$/

list.definition: show tag values from requestsRaw with key=loadGenerator
list.name: lg
list.query: show tag values from requestsRaw with key=loadGenerator

dashboard.title: jmeter Load Test
